verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> at the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G5085>Tiberias,<s%> and He <S%G5319>manifested<s%> [Himself] in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way.<s%>

There were <S%G3674>together<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> and <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> of <S%G2580>Cana<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and the [sons] of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I am <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G232>fishing.<s%>" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "We will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> with you." They <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G1684>got<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat;<s%> and that <S%G3571>night<s%> they <S%G4084>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

But when the <S%G4407>day<s%> was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1096>breaking,<s%> <S%G4407><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> on the <S%G123>beach;<s%> <S%G3305>yet<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> did not <S%G3609>know<s%> that it was <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3813>"Children,<s%> you do not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4371>fish,<s%> do you?" They <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G3756>"No.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G906>"Cast<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> on the right-hand <S%G3313>side<s%> of the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and you will <S%G2147>find<s%> [a catch]." They <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3765>then<s%> they were not <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1670>haul<s%> it in <S%G575>because<s%> of the <S%G4128>great<s%> <S%G4128>number<s%> of <S%G2486>fish.<s%>

That <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> "It is the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>" And <S%G3767>so<s%> when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that it was the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G1241>put<s%> his <S%G1903>outer<s%> <S%G1903>garment<s%> on (for he was <S%G1131>stripped<s%> [for work]), and <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

But the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> in the <S%G4142>little<s%> <S%G4142>boat,<s%> for they were not <S%G3112>far<s%> from the <S%G1093>land,<s%> but <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1250>one<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4083>yards<s%> <S%G575>away,<s%> <S%G4951>dragging<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> [full] of <S%G2486>fish.<s%>

And <S%G3767>so<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G576>got<s%> out upon the <S%G1093>land,<s%> they <S%G991>saw<s%> a <S%G439>charcoal<s%> <S%G439>fire<s%> [already] <S%G2749>laid,<s%> and <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G1945>placed<s%> on it, and <S%G740>bread.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5342>"Bring<s%> <S%G575>some<s%> of the <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4084>caught.<s%>"

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up, and <S%G1670>drew<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> to <S%G1093>land,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and fifty-three; and although there were <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many,<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> was not <S%G4977>torn.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>"Come<s%> [and] <S%G709>have<s%> <S%G709>breakfast.<s%>" <S%G3762>None<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5111>ventured<s%> to <S%G1833>question<s%> Him, <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are You?" <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that it was the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them, and the <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> after He was <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G709>finished<s%> <S%G709>breakfast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> [son] of <S%G2491>John,<s%> do you <S%G25>love<s%> Me <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G3778>these<s%>?" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> You <S%G3609>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> You." He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1006>"Tend<s%> My <S%G721>lambs.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him <S%G3825>again<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> [son] of <S%G2491>John,<s%> do you <S%G25>love<s%> Me?" He <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> You <S%G3609>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> You." He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4165>"Shepherd<s%> My <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> [son] of <S%G2491>John,<s%> do you <S%G5368>love<s%> Me?" <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time,<s%> "Do you <S%G5368>love<s%> Me?" And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> You <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things;<s%> You <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G5368>love<s%> You. <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1006>"Tend<s%> My <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3753>when<s%> you were <S%G3501>younger,<s%> you used to <S%G2224>gird<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> you <S%G2309>wished;<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G1095>grow<s%> <S%G1095>old,<s%> you will <S%G1614>stretch<s%> out your <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and <S%G243>someone<s%> <S%G243>else<s%> will <S%G2224>gird<s%> you, and <S%G5342>bring<s%> you <S%G3699>where<s%> you do not <S%G2309>wish<s%> to [go."]

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G4169>kind<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> he would <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> And when He had <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me!"

<S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G1994>turning<s%> <S%G1994>around,<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G190>following<s%> [them;] the one <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> had <S%G377>leaned<s%> <S%G377>back<s%> on His <S%G4738>breast<s%> at the <S%G1173>supper,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is the one who <S%G3860>betrays<s%> You?"
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3708>seeing<s%> him <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> about <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G2309>want<s%> him to <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> [is that] to you? You <S%G190>follow<s%> Me!"

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> that that <S%G3101>disciple<s%> would not <S%G599>die;<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> did not <S%G3004>say<s%> to him that he would not <S%G599>die,<s%> but [only,] <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G2309>want<s%> him to <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> [is that] to you?"

<S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> who <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things;<s%> and we <S%G3609>know<s%> that his <S%G3141>witness<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%>

And there are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they were <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G1520>detail,<s%> I <S%G3633>suppose<s%> that <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> would not <S%G5562>contain<s%> the <S%G975>books<s%> which were <S%G1125>written.<s%>
